relation: Great for these types of students
Great for students trying to get a degree without going into endless debt.
Going to community college is a great way to get your basics out of the way at a a reasonable price. They also have programs available that enable you to begin your career after completion.
Register for classes early so you can get in to the classes you need at the time/day that you want.
Mott Community College is reasonably priced. They have many programs of study available. Classes are available at convenient times.
pageTitle: Mott Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {12446=Get registered for classes early, especially if you are going for the fall 2011 semester. Classes fill up quick. The campus at Mott Community college is great, its a great environment. Also Mott now has dorms, they share dorms witht the U of M flint, Baker and Kettering. The dorms are called the River Front resident hall, the prices are great, for a single room it's only $3,000 a year., 120777=Mott Community College has a September 11th memorial with a beam from one of the Twin Towers, honoring the fallen victims., 176796=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Roselee from flint, MI 06/02/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 7 people found this review useful. 1 person found it offensive. 1 person found this inaccurate. 2 of 45 Categories Comments Great for these types of students 1. get exp in what you major in 2. stay away form people trying to mess up your career 3. stay close to your family 4. major in some thing you love Tips for prospective students go out the state you live in but dont come michigan Am enjoying being here i just want to get my degree and then move on to much better. Am learning a lot ok but it can be better Login to rate or flag the reviews Joshua
